00021 /**
00022  * @file   CallsFileReader.h
00023  * @author Anthony Kosky
00024  * @date   Feb 2, 2016  
00025  * @brief  Simple class for reading tsv file of calls generated from Axiom blob - not
00026  *      using TranslationInputTsvTable because of varying number of columns
00027  */
00028 
00029 
00030 #ifndef CALLS_FILE_READER_H
00031 #define CALLS_FILE_READER_H
00032 
00033 #include <string>
00034 #include <vector>
00035 #include <fstream>
00036 
00037 class CallsFileReader
00038 {
00039 public:
00040   CallsFileReader ();
00041   ~CallsFileReader ();
00042 
00043 private:
00044   std::fstream  m_fstream;
00045   std::vector<std::string>  m_vExperiments;  // CEL file names/column headers
00046   std::vector<std::string>  m_vProbesetIds;
00047 
00048   // m_vvCalls - vector of rows, each consisting of vector of calls for experiments
00049   std::vector<std::vector<std::string> >    m_vvCalls;
00050 
00051   int m_iExp;       // number of experiment
00052   int m_iRow;       // current row
00053   int m_iNumExp;   
00054   int m_iNumRows;   
00055   int m_iMaxAlleles;    // read from keyval pair
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00059   bool readFile(const std::string& sFilename);
00060 
00061   bool nextRow();   // return false on last row
00062   bool nextExperiment(); // return false on last experiment
00063 
00064   int  getNumExperiments() {return m_iNumExp;};
00065   int  getNumRows() {return m_iNumRows;};
00066   int  getMaxAlleles() {return m_iMaxAlleles;}
00067 
00068 private:
00069   static const std::string s_sEmpty;
00070 
00071 public:
00072 
00073   const std::string& getExperimentName() const {
00074     if (m_iExp < 0 || m_iExp >= m_iNumExp) {
00075       return s_sEmpty;
00076     }
00077     return m_vExperiments.at(m_iExp);
00078   }
00079 
00080   const std::string& getProbeset()  const{
00081     if (m_iRow < 0 || m_iRow >= m_iNumRows) {
00082       return s_sEmpty;
00083     }
00084     return m_vProbesetIds.at(m_iRow);
00085   }
00086 
00087   const std::string& getCall() const {
00088     if (m_iRow < 0 || m_iRow >= m_iNumRows || m_iExp < 0 || m_iExp >= m_iNumExp) {
00089       return s_sEmpty;
00090     }
00091     return m_vvCalls.at(m_iRow).at(m_iExp);
00092   }
00093 
00094 private:
00095   bool getLine(std::string& line);
00096 
00097   void splitLine(const std::string& line, std::vector<std::string>&  vFields);
00098 }; // CallsFileReader
00099 
00100 
00101 #endif
